-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



On 16-05-24 03:21 AM, wei_jok@... [neat] wrote:
> 
> 
> Hi Ken
> 
> 
> Thanks for the reply.  Would be interested to check out the GPU 
> implementation later on.
> 
> I agree with you, I noticed there's some deep hatred towards
> anything EA or GA in the machine learning community, which seems
> quite odd and strange to me!
> 
> Dave

Hi Dave,

It seems GA/GP isn't taught in most machine learning courses,
so people who's experience is limited to those courses,
typically only have a very vague understanding of EA/GP.
Some people fear what they do not understand.

For example, I've on numerous occasions been told that GP is different
from supervised learning.

Likely the best thing would simply be to provide more tutorials and
lessons accessible to novices, named something like "Machine Learning
with Evolutionary Algorithms".


- --
